title: Reimbursement to counties; agreement with counties to provide permits
context: ยง291-51.3 Reimbursement to counties; agreement with counties to provide permits. The State shall reimburse the counties for the unit cost of providing a removable windshield placard or a temporary removable windshield placard on behalf of the State. The reimbursement rate paid to the counties for providing removable windshield placards, temporary removable windshield placards, special license plates, and identification cards shall be established pursuant to section 291-56; provided that a county may retain any fees charged for a transaction. [L 2006, c 269, ยง1; am L 2007, c 77, ยง1; am L 2010, c 141, ยง2]
